name: Jürgen Dorn
content: Jürgen Dorn | E-Commerce Skip to main content Home » Staff » Jürgen Dorn Jürgen Dorn Associate Professor Contact Information Phone+43 (1) 58801-18809 Fax+43 (1) 58801-18899 Emailjuergen.dorn@tuwien.ac.at Webhttp://www.ec.tuwien.ac.at/jdorn HoursWednesdays 4-5pm OfficeHB0222, Favoritenstraße 9-11, A-1040 Wien Biography: I have studied computer science and business science at Technische Universität Berlin. In 1989 I have finished my Ph.D. thesis in Berlin on knowledge-based realtime planning (thesis published by Vieweg Verlag). From 1989 to 1995 I worked for the Christian Doppler Laboratory for Expert Systems at TU Wien. In the DéjàVu and the Refresh project I have developed with colleagues scheduling and planning systems for Austrian Industries. Since 1997, I am ao. Prof at the Faculty of Informatics of TU Wien. From 1999 until 2009 I lead a group at E-Commerce Competence Center on Virtual Enterprises.
